modName: Dynasty White Armor - CBBE v2 - Skimpy and Super Skimpy
summary: Dynasty White Armor - CBBE v2. Retextured, this armor mod comes in white regular, skimpy and super skimpy for CBBE v2
descriptionHtml:
Dynasty White Armor for CBBE v2.


***UPDATED with revealing bewbs of each curiass version


This is a retexture of the Dynasty Armor. The original port from codecrackerx9 and the CBBE mesh from drakishar with my own texture. This mod comes in the following styles:

Skimpy Regular (skimpy top only).
Skimpy with black undies.
Skimpy with white undies.
Super skimpy with.... you guessed it, no undies.
Each of the above versions has a revealing bewb version.
Original drakishar version retextured.
Original codecrackerx9 chainmail version (this is the ported mesh so is a lot different from the others but I wanted to keep it in this set) retextured.

Features:
All versions are standalone and are available for crafting, buying at Bethlor\'s shop in Whiterun, or obtaining with the console.
All versions are upgradable and have no enchantments by default.
Stats are based on either the Dragonscale or Dragonplate armor (not been able to work it out from the original .esp).
Retextured the gloves with chainmesh and fixed parts where the skin was showing through. The gloves mesh is a little ropey and doesn\'t quite fit the fingers properly; I can\'t edit the meshes (yet) and it could so with some love.
The black/white undies are simply completely white or black but do look kinda cool in the right light with the light reflections.

Craft at a forge (under dragon); leather strips, dragon scale and dragon bone.
Obtain via console. Type \'player.additem xxxxxxxx 1\' where xxxxxxxx is the id below.
The XX at the start is the loading order of the mod. If you don\'t know the loading order start at 01 and work up until the item is added. Note the loading order is base 16 (hex) so goes in this order: 00-09 0a-0f 10-19 1a-1f and so on.

XX0087A0 - original CBBE v2 curiass
XX0087A1 - Boots
XX0087A2 - Gauntlets
XX0087A3 - Original ported chainmail curiass
XX0087A4 - Super Skimpy
XX0087A5 - Skinpy orig undies
XX0087A6 - Skimpy white undies
XX0087A7 - Skimpy black undies
In Ver 1.2:
XX0087A8 - Super Skimpy with revealing bewbs
XX0087A9 - Skinpy orig undies with revealing bewbs
XX0087AA - Skimpy white undies with revealing bewbs
XX0087AB - Skimpy black undies with revealing bewbs

Installation:
Drop the textures and meshes folders over your existing textures and meshes folder. Place the .esp in the \\data folder.
The esp is a modified version of codecrackerx9\'s/drakishar\'s esp so should over write theirs with no issues. The modified esp contains additions only so should not cause any issues, though please report if it does.

Uninstallation:
Remove the .esp file
Remove the \'Dynasty\' folder from \\meshes\\armor\\
Remove the \'Dynasty\' folder from \\textures\\armor\\

Change Log:
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Fixed bug where \'black undies\' version armor (only) would change to a less skimpy version with weight slider maxed. Thanks SuicideDream for spotting this!
1.2 - Added revealing bewb versions of the 4 skimpy curiass.

Credits and big thanks to:
codecrackerx9 for the original port to skyrim and the original .esp - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5733
drakishar for modding and making a fine CBBE v2 mesh - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6166
ken1945 for the original work, which none of these Dynasty mods would have been possible without - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=39413
Apogee777, see below.
Other credits to kit rae, twenkle, durotar (I assume from the original TES4 mod)

Permissions:
My textures - Do what the hell you want with them, I don\'t require crediting, but it would be nice.
The mesh from drakishar - use as you see fit. See his perms here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6166 (It\'s also nice to credit him too)
Credit codecrackerx9 for the port and original .esp (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5733).
Credit ken1945 for the original work along with kit rae, twenkle, durotar.


General waffle:
This is my thrid mod so far which I\'m pretty pleased with. The changes from drakishar\'s mod are kinda subtle but offer a skimpy version of this armor to go in line with some of the other skimpy armors on the nexus (if you like that kinda thing, which I do). I would have upped this a few days ago but I had some wierd lighting issue on the parts where I have applied alpha. I do have to say thanks to Apogee777 as it was from pulling one of his mods to bits that I discovered the fix for the lighting issue.

If anyone is interested in the parts of my character:
CBBE v2 Body - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Skeuomorph skin (black) - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4254
Face - Better Females by Bella - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Detailed Lips - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=689
No More Blocky Faces - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30
Eyes - My own pink texture.
Hair - From some Chinese site. I don\'t speak Chinese and didn\'t understand a word on the website, so I can\'t vouch for its permissions etc. Because of that and in line with the nexus rules, I won\'t post a link to it. Don\'t ask, your request will be simply ignored. Google is your friend.
author: Simomax - Codecrackerx9 drakishar and ken1945
